titles.title: To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to prohibit the inclusion of certain information in files and credit reports relating to consumers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Credit and Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 3/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Fair Credit Reporting Act to prohibit a consumer reporting agency from maintaining in the file of, or furnishing in a report on, a consumer any information regarding a failure to make a payment on an account primarily because of the consumer's lack of access to funds in financial institutions in a State due to a bank holiday.
